feed.title: Sergio's Secret Blog - software package
feed.subtitle: An assortment of my ramblings and random adventures.

entry.title: [9] vimtutor-sequel: The Extended vimtutor
entry.summary: The vimtutor program is the essential starting point for anyone looking to learn the basics of using Vim. In as little as a half hour, you can learn 90% of what you'll ever need for vim, however, there are many useful motions and commands that are left out of the program. This article details the simple software package I wrote to address this limitation, vimtutor-sequel.
